name: select_hour
description: Select the hour from the time picker.
parameters: {'hour': 'Which hour do you want to select?'}

name: select_minute
description: Select the minute from the time picker.
parameters: {'minute': 'Which minute do you want to select?'}

name: switch_to_text_input_mode
description: Switch the time picker to text input mode for manually entering the time.

name: cancel_time_selection
description: Cancel the current time selection and close the time picker.

name: confirm_time_selection
description: Confirm the selected time and close the time picker.
